overview: Elton Chong stars as a martial arts whiz-kid named Chuck, who, after being taught by master Leon Chan, becomes an expert in the Shaolin "13 styles" and all forms of swordplay.  On a secret mission for General Ching, Chan escorts a treasure to a section of the Yangtze River where a flood has ravaged the area.  In his way is Eagle, a henchman of General Ching, who inflicts a fatal wound on Chan.  Now it is up to Chuck to save the day and avenge his master.  Mad trad kung fu all the way!
title: Invincible Obsessed Fighter
